column5: a bps prowler 40 lb thruster electric troller is my first taste of creature comforts in boat control devices.wanted one for a long time but only now did it make financial sense.a buddy gave me 2 ministry\road sign grade rechargeable batteries , can.tire had a great charger sale and i had $30 can tire moneys saved , just couldn't say no.lookin' forward to tryin' it all out. perch opener will be the try -out .
